original_text: The officer heard what Paul said. So he went to the leader of the soldiers and he said, ‘That man is a citizen of Rome! Be careful what you do to him!’
korean_text: 백부장이 듣고 가서 천부장에게 전하여 이르되 어찌하려 하느냐 이는 로마 시민이라 하니

sentences.original_text: The officer heard what Paul said
sentences.korean_translation: 그 장교는 바울이 말한 것을 들었습니다

sentences.original_text: So he went to the leader of the soldiers
That man is a citizen of Rome
Be careful what you do to him
